EmailTemplate.name: HR Visa/Work Permit Expiration Date Notice Dependent
EmailTemplate.subject: Visa/Work Permit Expiration Notice- {!Dependent.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Employee Visa or Work Permit Expiration Notice:
Please note that {!Account.FirstName} {!Account.LastName}'s visa/work permit will be expiring soon. See details below:
Visa Type: {!Account.Visa_Type__c}Visa Expiration Date: {!Account.Visa_Expiration_Date__c}Work Permit Expiration Date: {!Account.Work_Permit_Expiration_Date__c}
Consult Employee record for more details.
